Detailed Description

This class represent the basical entity of the Lump's world and it is a wrapper between the OpenSteer's AbstractVehicle implemented by SteerableBase and the Ogre's SceneNode.

Author:
Bernardino Frola
All entities that have a position, direction, and the OpenSteer attributes, such as, maxSpeed, maxForce, ect. have to extend this class.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum SteerableEntity::mRenderingStates

Entity rendering states:

  • visible;
  • showing: trasiting from hidden to visible;
  • hidden;
  • hiding: trasiting from visible to hidden;

enum SteerableEntity::mGeneralStates

Entity running state

  • running;
  • colling: haved an impact;
  • exploding: the entity is dying.

void SteerableEntity::checkForCollisions ( AVGroup  neighbors  ) 

Collision detection function.

Parameters:
<neighbors> The list of neighbor over to check for collision.
Note: a sub-class that use this method must necessarily to implement the virtual method SteerableEntity::onImpactWith

void SteerableEntity::impactWith ( SteerableEntity *  entity  ) 

This method is called when an impact detected in SteerableEntity::checkForCollisions occours. Here, is calculated the impactWeight value.

Parameters:
<entity> Impacted object.

void SteerableEntity::manageImpact ( SteerableEntity *  impacted,
float  normMass,
Vector3  weightedVelocity 
)

Compute the repulsion vector and impacts dynamics.

Parameters:
<impacted> Impacted object.
<normMass> Mass comparated to the sum of the mass with the impacted object.
<weightedVelocity> Velocity result after the impact.

virtual void SteerableEntity::onUpdate ( const float  currentTime,
const float  elapsedTime 
) [pure virtual]

The method SteerableEntity::udateEntity, at its end, call this one. The sub-class must insert here the specialized update operations.

Implemented in EntityAsteroid, EntityFlockItem, EntityPlanet, EntityPlayerShip, and FlockBase.
